entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
